class.name: DojoEditorPlugin
class.brief_description: The editor plugin for the Dojo SDK.
class.description: This class provides the editor functionality for the Dojo SDK, including tools for managing project settings.

method.name: init_config
method.description: Initializes the configuration settings. If [param reset] is true, it resets the settings to their default values.

method.name: init_setting
method.description: Initializes a specific setting with a given value. If [param force] is true, it overwrites any existing value.

method.name: reset_project_settings
method.description: Resets the Dojo-related project settings to their default values.
